channel.title: When i log in i want it to say owner
channel.description: hi im owner of a server and when i log in i want it to say the owner has logged in any one know how to do this

item.title: When i log in i want it to say owner
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

NO NO do this:

Search for: GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); in client.java when u get to the last one… add this under it with two “enter” spaces if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "YOUR MESSAGE!!";

Read full topic
item.source: When i log in i want it to say owner

item.source: When i log in i want it to say owner

item.title: When i log in i want it to say owner
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Ok, open client.java, and search:

pEmote = playerSE;

Their will be many of them, so just hold ctrl + f once and search until you see this

		[code]pEmote = playerSE;
	}

SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));[/code]

Then directly under add what you want like this:

//SPACE DON'T REMOVE// if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "SERVERNAMEHERE Owner, YOUNAMEHERE , has logged in!";

Make sure it looks like this:

		[code]pEmote = playerSE;
	}

SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
//SPACE DON’T REMOVE//
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAMEHERE”))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “SERVERNAMEHERE Owner, YOURNAMEHERE , has logged in!”;[/code]

Many Thanks

Musicmad441

Read full topic
